Differential Equations | Homogeneous System of Linear Differential Equations Example 3

[imath]\mathbf{y}^{\prime}=\left(\begin{array}{cc}\n\mathbf{9} & -\mathbf{5} \\\n\mathbf{1 3} & -\mathbf{7}\n\end{array}\right) \mathbf{Y}[/imath]\nusing the matrix exponential[imath]\mathbf{9} & -\mathbf{5} [/imath] [imath]\mathbf{1 3} & -\mathbf{7}[/imath]
